1.0.name: wordpress/crazyegg-integrator-for-wordpress
1.0.description:
Plugin Overview:

This plugin will allow you to integrate in the CrazyEgg integration code into your website without the need of modifying your websites code or themes.

CrazyEgg:

CrazyEgg allows you to track your users site usage and see on a visual map just where they are clicking and how they use your website. This in turn will give you an idea of the usability of your website. CrazyEgg does have a subscription fee.
